other_tests.findings: Mood and symptoms of throat tightness improved.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 1-year follow-up, with the same imipramine dose, she was still markedly improved and was able to function adequately.

other_tests.findings: After 3 days of phenelzine treatment she was taking foods by mouth and was less depressed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On the 13th hospital day, the feeding tube was removed and she began eating at least 1500 calories per day, with a resultant weight gain to 102 lb over the next month. At 1-year follow-up, she had had no recurrence of her swallowing difficulties, and had a stable weight of about 100 lb.

other_tests.findings: Ms. C became asymptomatic within 7 days and resumed eating.
other_tests.changes_over_time: She was back to her normal weight within a month. After 4 weeks, she developed symptoms of orthostatic hypotension, and the medication was discontinued. She remained symptom-free with no medication at 4-month follow-up.
